Player History
Signed as a free agent by California on 3/1/1967 to a minor league contract.
Drafted in 7th round, 137th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1972...
Injured on 4/7/1973 with a Jammed Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/16/1977 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Traded from New York (N) to Cleveland on 7/21/1978 (Going to NYM: RF L. Herndon. Going to CLE: C R. Hodges, SS D. Cripe, P G. Zahn)...
Had first career hit on 9/2/1978, off Mike Flanagan (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/2/1978, off Pete Vuckovich (OAK)...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 7/17/1979...
